column4: Anyone know why I get error "bash: deb: command not found" when tryng to add Universe and Multiverse Repositories?  Here is the command : deb http://archive.canonical.com/ubuntu dapper partner
let us see your sources.list
I am new to linux. How can I display the source.list?
cat /etc/apt/sources.list and cut and paste to paste.ubuntu.com and give is the url
here is the error I receive "bash: etc/apt/source.list: No such file or directory'
type this (w/o the quotes) "cat /etc/apt/sources.list" then paste that to paste.ubuntu.com
Please forgive me, I'm new to linux....I have the source.list information now. You mentioned to paste the output to paste.ubuntu.com, is that here in the channel?
it is a webpage
ok
paste it there then give us the url here
will do
here is the url, http://paste.ubuntu.com/36220/
how did you get this sources.list
what error were you getting ; please paste that to paste.ubuntu.com
http://paste.ubuntu.com/36223/
why add dapper archive to hardy
I have no idea. I made no changes (because I don't know how). Just installed the OS and installed updates
go into software sources and enable repos there
Repos enabled. Do you want to look at another source.list?
now refresh
Hi, thanks for helping me the other day. I got Real Player 11 Gold installed and running.
nice work :)
